title: WithSecure publishes restated financial information for its continuing operations for 2021 - Yahoo Finance
content: WithSecure publishes restated financial information for its continuing operations for 2021  Yahoo Finance
description: WithSecure Corporation, Stock Exchange Release, 16 May 2022, at 8:00 EEST WithSecure publishes restated financial information for its continuing operations for 2021 As announced in a stock exchange release on 17 February 2022, the Board of Directors of WithSecure Corporation (“WithSecure”) decided to pursue towards the separation of the Consumer Security business through a partial demerger (the “Demerger”), whereby WithSecure’s Consumer Security business would be transferred into a new independe
